Careers QA Automation Engineer

QA Automation Engineer

Ukraine

Overview

We are looking for an experienced QA Automation Engineer who would like to become a part of the team that builds real solutions for real users and works with the latest technologies & frameworks.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of commercial automating experience (Python, JS)
  • QA experience/knowledge
  • Experience with API Automation testing
  • Solid programming skills with Python or JS
  • Hands-on experience with building automation test platform for functional and non-functional testing and with related tools
  • CI/CD experience (Jenkins / AWS CodeBuild)
  • Experience with Selenium, Cypress, Docker, Jenkins
  • API (curl, postman, python-requests)
  • Upper-intermediate level of English

Enkonix benefits:

  • 5-day working week from Monday to Friday
  • 8-hour working day, which starts between 9:00 and 11:00 Kyiv time
  • 100% taxes compensation according to Ukrainian legislation
  • Providing help with opening sole proprietorship and partial taxes compensation abroad
  • Paid vacation — 18 working days per year
  • Paid unlimited sick leaves
  • Salary reviews every 6 months
  • Performance review twice a year with goals check every 2 months
  • Personal MacBook for work
  • Partial English, sport and education reimbursement
  • BYOD compensation
  • Career development, knowledge sharing, and training opportunities
  • Friendly teammates and corporate social events
  • Support with personal projects and opportunities to take new roles & responsibility

Responsibility:

As a QA Automation Engineer, you’ll be responsible for the quality of the web and mobile products. Day to day work would imply:

  • Help to design, build and maintain a platform for functional and non-functional testing of a microservices application, including reporting and tests results visualization
  • Research and evaluate technical options to implement project requirements
  • Perform functional and non-functional test cases design, automation and review
  • Mastering the product — provide hands-on quality direction
  • Analyzing and processing product requirements
  • Driving exploratory testing, authoring test plans and test cases, as well as regression suits for the product
  • Taking part in continuous process improvement

About us:

Enkonix is a technology consulting organization that connects strategy, design, and engineering services into a seamless workflow devised to support clients every step of the way. Over the past 5 years, we have designed and built a diverse range of high-quality products from scratch. Our specialists have expertise in various spheres including e-learning, healthcare, e-commerce, advertising, augmented reality, finance, sharing economy, and many more.

You have the chance to become a part of the team that builds real solutions for real users and works with the latest technologies & frameworks. This is your unique opportunity to contribute to the product that will be used worldwide and impact the industry.

We use the Kanban methodology and the following technology stack for this project:

  • Back-end: Python3+, Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL, Redis, Celery, Daphne, Gunicorn.
  • Front-end: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Vuex, Vuetify.
  • Other: Git (Bitbucket), CI/CD with Jenkins/AWS Codebuild, Nginx, Supervisor.
  • AWS stack: EC2, S3, RDS, SNS, SQS, ECS, CloudFormation, Fargate, Codebuild, Route53, Cloudfront.
